Command of the Abyss.name: Command of the Abyss
Command of the Abyss.flavor: Calling forth lore that bound the powerful demon Kulnoghrim, you rend your foe’s mind and leave it less able to ward off outside influences.
Command of the Abyss.onHit: 1d6 + Constitution psychic damage, and you stun the target until the end of your next turn.

Vestige of Kulnoghrim.name: Vestige of Kulnoghrim
Vestige of Kulnoghrim.flavor: You don the awesome fury of Kulnoghrim the Terrible, bringing his fiery wrath and madness down on your enemies.
Vestige of Kulnoghrim.onHit: 3d10 fire damage and ongoing 10 fire damage (save ends).
Vestige of Kulnoghrim.onMiss: Half damage and ongoing 5 fire damage (save ends).
Vestige of Kulnoghrim.vestigePact: You gain access to the vestige of Kulnoghrim.
Vestige of Kulnoghrim.kulnoghrimPactBoon: One creature within 5 squares or affected by your Warlock’s Curse makes a basic attack against a target of your choice as a free action.
Vestige of Kulnoghrim.eyesOfTheVestigeAugment: If your eyes of the vestige target doesn’t end its next turn farther from you than it began the turn, it takes fire damage equal to your Intelligence modifier.

Clarifying Rebuke.name: Clarifying Rebuke
Clarifying Rebuke.flavor: You rally your will, calling upon the secrets of the cabal’s Grand Jailer to stay in control.
Clarifying Rebuke.trigger: An effect dominates you, or you are subject to a charm or fear effect that a save can end
Clarifying Rebuke.effect: The triggering effect doesn’t affect you. You can place your Warlock’s Curse on the creature that caused the triggering effect, if any.
